scripts.copypkgfiles: yarn cleanlib && cp README.md ./lib/ && cp package.json ./lib/
scripts.copyforrelease: yarn copypkgfiles && yarn copybin && yarn copytemplates
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && npm version patch && yarn copyforrelease && cd lib && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && npm version minor && yarn copyforrelease && cd lib && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.release:major: yarn build && npm version major && yarn copyforrelease && cd lib && npm publish --dry-run
